entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor NET.8] Add global option for disable pre-rendering #50744
  • Persisting Data Across SSR and Blazor Server #50741
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer 7.0.10 results in Unbounded Breakpoints for swa cli #50740
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #50739
  • Content security policy issue for embedded browser(chromium) in Blazor Web assembly .js file with eval() #50738
  • RC1 Blazor Web App NavMenu Has Double Icons When Importing Bootstrap Icons Script In Head #50737
    8.0
  • Hot reload not working with WASM components in Blazor 8RC1 component #50735
  • StreamRendering on first page continue to render after navigation #50733
  • Should we disable asp0014 when using `WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder()` #50732
  • .Net 8 RC1 WASM - compatibility - lack of support for older systems #50729
  • Consider updating `InputFile` to support `@bind` expression so it can auto-generate the name attribute #50728
  • Allow to parse 1 to boolean for SupplyParameterFromQuery attribute in Blazor app #50726
  • Azure AD B2C and Blazor Web App Net8 Authentication #50725
  • Blazor component passed as cascading parameter is null when used in MainLayout.razor (.NET 8.0 RC 1) #50724

Closed

  • Access additional services in Program.cs not working #38326
    8.0-rc2
  • Spruce up `OpenApiResponse` creation in `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` package #41243
    Backlog
  • Docs - Minimal API Basics #44256
    7.0.0
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #50714
  • Event handlers in layout do not seem to fire in a .NET 8 RC1 blazor application #50712
  • Incorrect swagger.json definition for GET endpoints in Minimal API when using Keyed Services #50704
    8.0-rc2
  • dotnet publish appears to be using an incorrect base container with DN8RC1 #50718
  • [SignalR-Client-Cpp] Fails in start() when there is no network connection #50698
  • Failed to load Blazor WebAssembly project in Production after upgrading to .NET 8 RC1 #50719
  • Blazor Web App --> NavigationManager doesn't navigate without `forceLoad` #50691
    8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Add support for onclose event for dialog #50513
    8.0-rc2
  • The Client project of the Blazor Web App template should also have a Components folder #50645
    8.0-rc2
  • Add automated Blazor Hybrid test #50193
    8.0-rc2
  • C# Dev Kit for VS Code missing controller based API project template. #49617

PullRequests

Created

  • Update IAcceptsMetadata docs to reflect behavior of matcher policy #50747
    Docs, area-minimal
  • Retry stateful reconnect attempts #50745
    area-signalr
  • Port Blazor Hybrid Photino test to release/net8 #50743
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Prerendered state #50742
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK version #50734
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8a6feab` to `d1467f5` #50731
    area-infrastructure
  • Resolve CVE-2021-43877 #50723
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Identity Components to Blazor template #50722
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Support resolving form files in complex form mapping #50537
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • Blazor: add support for onclose event #50727
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Blazor Web project interactive options improvements. Rename render modes. #50684
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Enable build acceleration #50205
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2267489 #50713
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix XML docs on Redis OutputCaching extensions #50716
    area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50695
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #50666
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Persist Prerendered State #50625
    area-blazor
  • Replace ''return'' with lambda expression ''=>''. #50711
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    area-networking
